detail.description: Madras Fertilizers Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of Urea and Complex Fertilizers. It is also involved in manufacturing Bio-fertilizers and trading eco-friendly Agro Chemicals, Organic Manure, and City Compost under the brand name ‘Vijay’. [1]
